title: Fat Joe Interview and More
itunes:title: Fat Joe Interview and More
description:
Tuesday 8/1 - Today on the show our guy Fat Joe stopped by and he was so excited, funny because that is the name of his new song. Also, after Angela spoke about rapper Boosie Badazz getting his brother arrested for stealing money from him, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners would do the same thing. Also, Charlamagne gave “Donkey of the Day” to singer Willa Ford because she blames 9/11 for her failed music career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 8/1 - Today on the show our guy Fat Joe stopped by and he was so excited, funny because that is the name of his new song. Also, after Angela spoke about rapper Boosie Badazz getting his brother arrested for stealing money from him, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners would do the same thing. Also, Charlamagne gave “Donkey of the Day” to singer Willa Ford because she blames 9/11 for her failed music career.
